ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Runed Bolster Belt
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh.  This was after an aborted Hate trip (other group already there), so we were all in South Ro.  No wisps there, so I dueled the guy with the RBB.  I
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 11 Apr 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> Ok, ok, I mean wth? You had a Runed Bolster Belt Handy, but the only weapon
> you had around was a scythe? This is either the funniest necro soloing
> story I have ever heard or I need a vacation.

Heh. This was after an aborted Hate trip (other group already
there), so we were all in South Ro. No wisps there, so I
dueled the guy with the RBB. I sure as h*ll wasn't about to
let him beat on me with a Mistwalker and Dragonspine Claw, and
I wanted a weapon with a large delay so I could get a more
accurate timing with fewer swings. Someone happened to have a
scythe around, so that's what we used.

I should be getting timings for Sunderfury and Monsoon (both
warrior haste weapons) soon.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
